longInfo:
Passport required.
- Nationals of Belgium are allowed to enter with an expired
  passport. The passport is accepted when expired for a
  maximum of 5 years. 
- Nationals of Belgium traveling without a passport must have
  a document accepted for entry, valid on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to nationals of
  Belgium. 
- Holders of a Temporary National ID Card issued to nationals
  of Belgium. 
- Holders of an ID card for children under 15 years of age
  issued to nationals of Belgium. 
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports issued to
  nationals of Belgium. 

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Belgium will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
- All minors who are nationals of Belgium are expected to hold
  their own travel document
